title: Veteran's Day Deal
description: Active duty military and veterans play for only $10.

title: Vote and get a BOGO
description: People wearing an "I Voted" sticker during election week can recieve a BOGO card.

title: Thanksgiving Break
description: Open Wed 11/27 and Fri 11/29 11:00am-8:45pm (closed Thanksgiving Day)

title: Winter Break
description: Open every day 11:00am-11:15pm from Dec 12/23 to Jan 1/8 (closed Christmas Eve & Day)
